body.description: Pepto Bismol Chewable Tablets for Nausea, Heartburn, Indigestion, Upset Stomach, and Diarrhea - 5 Symptom Fast Relief, Original Flavor. When you need upset stomach relief, Pepto coats, calms and soothes your stomach, providing fast digestive relief from nausea, heartburn, indigestion, upset stomach, and diarrhea. Convenient and easy to use - Pepto Bismol over-the-counter medicine is formulated to coat your digestive tract to calm and soothe and provide fast and effective 5 symptom relief. The convenient chewable form allows you to take Pepto Bismol on-the-go so you can travel worry-free. Take Pepto Bismol at the first sign of digestive issues so you can get rapid relief. Pepto Bismol provides fast relief from heartburn and indigestion, that uncomfortable feeling after you eat too much. It also provides relief from multiple stomach upsets so you can get back on track fast! From the maker of the #1 Pharmacist Recommended Upset Stomach Brand – Pepto Bismol. As a part of the P&G family, Pepto Bismol has high quality standards for all our products. Pepto Bismol has been a trusted brand for the treatment of upset stomachs for over 100 years. *May be HSA/ FSA eligible. *Based on Pharmacy Times 2022 Survey-upset stomach remedies category

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Pepto Bismol Chewable Tablets Product Detail When you have stomach troubles, Pepto’s coating action calms and soothes your stomach providing fast digestive relief from nausea, heartburn, indigestion, upset stomach, and diarrhea. Relieves traveler’s diarrhea, diarrhea and upset stomach due to overindulgence in food and drink including: heartburn, indigestion, nausea, gas, belching, and fullness.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been having a lot of digestive problems in the last couple of years and these are great to have on hand. The taste is pleasant enough, and they work quickly. One thing you need to know if you’re going to use these and then go out and see other people: they turn your tongue black! A lot of it comes off when you brush, but not all of it. Brushing twice might help, but I’ve never cared enough about it to try.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pepto pills for on the go
reviews.reviewText: I don't use these very often, so keeping a bottle generally results in a gunky rim and I toss it. I discovered these as an option and have been purchasing them ever since. It is convenient to leave some in my bag for when I eat that occasional meal that just begs for them. They do crumple up easily so it's best to put them in something to sort of protect them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pepto Bismal tablets
reviews.reviewText: Easy to chew, tastes great, and works fast. I keep a few in my purse, and in my car.The tablets are very convenient to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: You ever get that feeling that you should have taken some pepto but now you’re already out and it’s too late. Well this is the perfect solution, I have them everywhere. I keep a pack in the car, in my bag, in my partner’s purse, by the sink, by the computer. I have them literally everywhere and they work great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Its the good pink stuff
reviews.reviewText: I recommend keeping just a small one in your cupboard, just incase..... It does expire, so check the date and mark it in big bold marker so you keep an eye on it. And it does just what the commercials say, the box says and what you know.... it helps sort out your stomach. Good stuff when you need it, and good stuff to have for when you do need it, not at the store where you have to get it. Highly recommend it, and have yourself a wonderful 2024!!!

reviews.reviewerName: Very nice looking and it has a lot of slits
